titles.title: Furloughed Federal Employee Double Dip Elimination Act

To amend title 5, United States Code, to make clear that Federal employees who receive back pay for a period during which they are furloughed due to a lapse in appropriations may not also receive unemployment compensation for the same period.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
5/21/2015--Introduced. Furloughed Federal Employee Double Dip Elimination Act
Requires regulations pertaining to the compensation of a federal employee who receives back pay for a period in which such employee was furloughed due to a lapse in appropriations to ensure that such back pay be treated in the same way as federal wages attributable to such employee and that the period to which such back pay relates be treated in the same way as a period of federal service attributable to such employee (thereby disqualifying such employee for receipt of state unemployment compensation).
